subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sergei Gonchar scored Pittsburgh’s third power-play goal 3 minutes 33 seconds into overtime last night, and the Penguins, behind Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin, defeated the host Islanders, 4-3.
snippet: Sergei Gonchar scored Pittsburgh’s third power-play goal 3 minutes 33 seconds into overtime last night, and the Penguins, behind Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin, defeated the host Islanders, 4-3.
